articles.author: Ed Cara
articles.title: Desperate Long Covid Patients Paying Thousands for Unproven Blood-Filtering Treatments: Report - Gizmodo
articles.description: Clinics across Europe are selling costly experimental treatments to patients with long covid, despite little to no evidence for their benefits.
articles.content: A new investigative report out Tuesday finds that long covid patients are traveling overseas to try out costly and untested treatments for their symptoms, including having their blood filtered. But a… [+3545 chars]
